metadata.title: CVE-2022-44031 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Redmine before 4.2.9 and 5.0.x before 5.0.4 allows persistent XSS in itsTextile formatter due to improper sanitization of the blockquote syntax inTextile-formatted fields.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
